answer:
Yes. Your child can get vaccinated for free at your local health unit.  You can contact your local health unit to make an appointment. 
Immunization Nurse.
answer_formatted:
## Yes.


## Your child can get vaccinated for free at your local health unit.

You can contact your local health unit to make an appointment.
Immunization Nurse.
question: My child was born in the US. Would we still be able to get shots for her at health units before receiving her Canadian Citizenship/Health Card?
question_variation_0: can a child get a canadian citizenship card
question_variation_1: will a child still be able to take shots in health unit before claiming canadian citizenship
question_variation_2: can a canadian citizen get shots in canada before health card?
